title: 114_hr6303
content: This bill designates: the United States Postal Service (USPS) facility located at 1221 State Street, Suite 12, Santa Barbara, California, as the Special Warfare Operator Master Chief Petty Officer (SEAL) Louis 'Lou' J. Langlais Post Office Buildingquot, . The facility located at 23323 Shelby Road, Shelby, Indiana, as the quot, Richard Allen Cable Post Officequot, . The facility located at 3031 Veterans Road West, Staten Island, New York, as the quot, Leonard Montalto Post Office Buildingquot, . The facility located at 401 McElroy Drive, Oxford, Mississippi, as the quot, Army First Lieutenant Donald C. Carwile Post Office Buildingquot, . The facility located at 14231 TX-150, Coldspring, Texas, as the quot, E. Marie Youngblood Post Officequot, . The facility located at 810 N. US Highway 83, Zapata, Texas, as the quot, Zapata Veterans Post Officequot, . The facility located at 2886 Sandy Plains Road, Marietta, Georgia, as the quot, Marine Lance Corporal Squire 'Skip' Wells Post Office Buildingquot, . The facility located at 6300 N. Northwest Highway, Chicago, Illinois, as the quot, Officer Joseph P. Cali Post Office Building. The facility located at 1 Chalan Kanoa VLG, Saipan, Northern Mariana Islands, as the quot. Segundo T. Sablan and CNMI Fallen Military Heroes Post Office Buildingquot, . And the facility located at 1101 Davis Street, Evanstan, Illinois, as the quot, Abner J. Mikva Post Office Building. quot. The USPS must designate, by September 30, 2017, a single, unique ZIP code for each of: Miami Lakes, Florida, Storey County, Nevada, Flanders, Northampton, and Riverside in Southampton, New York, Ocoee, Florida, and Glendale, New York.
